completeness.description: Degree to which the task is completed according to the instructions.

correct_actions.description: The number of actions that are valid and adhere to the given available actions.

planning_quality.description: How well the planning of actions is carried out, considering the available environment information.

response_time.description: The speed of response to the environment and performing required actions.

adaptability.description: How well the assistant adapts to the changes in the environment and modifies its actions accordingly.

communication.description: The quality of the assistant's communication, such as following the required output format and clear thoughts.

termination_criteria.description: If the assistant terminates appropriately according to the task instructions.
